BadgeDetail.Name: Curious
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they have a desire to get beneath the surface of a subject. During induction, they have shown they are inquisitive and constantly seek to know why.
BadgeDetail.MetaData: Work readiness,Professional development,Personal development,Professionalism,Problem solving,Team working,Further Education,Age 16+

Task.Title: Curiousity
Task.Body: Describe something you have done that demonstrates your curiosity for one or more of your subjects.Example evidence could come from watching a documentary, reading some extension material on iLearn, subscribing to a magazine, blog or podcast, following leaders in their field on Twitter or going on a visit outside of College.
Task.HtmlBody:
Describe something you have done that demonstrates your curiosity for one or more of your subjects.

Example evidence could come from watching a documentary, reading some extension material on iLearn, subscribing to a magazine, blog or podcast, following leaders in their field on Twitter or going on a visit outside of College.
